name: Decentify
description: What is the project about? Decentralized web3 music platform that aims to revolutionize the music industry. By leveraging blockchain technology and smart contracts, Decentify creates a fair and transparent ecosystem for musicians, artists, and music enthusiasts. What makes your project unique? Utilizes decentralized storage and content distribution mechanisms, ensuring secure and global access to music files. It also employs blockchain-based smart contracts to automate royalty payments, eliminating disputes and delays in revenue distribution History of your project. Came for the idea to leverage spotify into the web3 spaces, makes the Intelectual Property management and subscription more easy and transparent Whatâ€™s next for your project? To create an IP management platform for music creator, subscription systems to private content What can your token be used for? Subscription, Royalties, Token Gating
